content: Another set of documentation ideas I had some time ago I finally put into words/design. It's regarding alias pages (like ndarray::Array2). https://gist.github.com/conradludgate/86a6eaa353e9325d244f18d5663a32e3
I agree that aliases should show impls on the underlying type, though the "methods from" wording seems potentially unnecessary.
Do you think it should just be top level, like the rest of the impls?
I think they're the same level of complexity regardless, so that can be decided later
